attributes.action: Prevent the sale of energy drinks to children 16 years and under
attributes.additional_details: Please help prevent the sale of high caffeine and taurine content energy drinks to children 16 years and under. The cons of these drinks outweigh the pros and pose a number of risks to adults let alone children whos bodies are still developing. Reasons why you should stay away from energy drinks are Weight gain, Cardiovascular problems, Psychological hindrances, Potential metabolic issues and Dependence/Addiction
